evidence.text:
Person A: She got scared, your mother. We were all scared.
Person B: I wasn’t quite as scared. For the record.
Person A: See what happens when you get a call, buddy.

Person B: Look at this... who created this? Who thought it up? A plug for a car. Electricity goes through. Makes it run. And what is electricity? It boggles the mind...
Person B: I think I know her...
Person A: I’m alright, darling. I’m alright.
